summary: This document discusses the creation of a control file (62-99724) under the caption, "CIA - James Angleton," for retaining copies of certain memoranda disseminated by James Angleton, Chief Counterintelligence Staff, CIA. It recommends discontinuing the practice of placing copies of Bureau Informant 100 material in the control file, while retaining the file for policy-related mail.
title: CENTRAL INTELLIGENCE AGENCY (CIA) INFORMATION RECEIVED FROM JAMES ANGLETON
